TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter
Public NotInheritable Class JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter Implements IMultiValueConverter

summary.span: 将后退导航历史记录和前进导航历史记录（由 或 公开）合并为单一的 Windows Internet Explorer 7 种样式的导航菜单。

span.span: merges navigation back history and navigation forward history (as exposed by or ) into a single, Windows Internet Explorer 7-style navigation menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时和显示支持使用下列机制的历史记录导航的导航 chrome:Both and display navigation chrome that supports history navigation using the following mechanisms: - 有关导航按钮一次备份一段内容。A button for navigating back one piece of content at a time. - 一个用于向前导航一段的内容一次的按钮。A button for navigating forward one piece of content at a time. - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-显示的样式下拉列表：An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list that shows: - 最多 9 个组合的列表项后退导航历史记录和高达九个前进导航历史记录中的项。A combined list of up to nine items in back navigation history and up to nine items in forward navigation history. - 当前段方面后退和前进导航历史记录的内容的位置。The position of the current piece of content with respect to both back and forward navigation history. 导航历史记录存储两个和中的以下属性：The navigation history is stored by both and in the following properties: **后退导航历史记录**: ， 。**Back Navigation History**: , . **前进导航历史记录**: ， 。**Forward Navigation History**: , . 若要创建[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-样式下拉列表中，和使用其各自的后退导航历史记录，并将合并到一个列表的导航历史记录条目前进导航历史记录。To create the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, and use to merge their individual back navigation history and forward navigation history into a single list of navigation history entries. 生成的列表包含最多 9 个条目后退导航历史记录和多达九个项前进导航历史记录，以及当前的内容的条目。The resulting list contains up to nine entries from back navigation history and up to nine entries from forward navigation history, plus an entry for the current content. 如果创建自定义导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，并且需要提供[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-样式下拉列表中，你可以使用到类似的效果。If you create custom navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], and need to provide an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, you can use to similar effect. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 在不常使用此类[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This class is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何构造基于文本的导航历史记录菜单。The following example shows how to construct a text-based navigation history menu. 菜单使用组合后退和前进导航历史记录将托管的导航器。The menu uses to combine both the back and forward navigation histories of the hosted navigator. [!code-xaml[JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterSnippets#JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterWithMenuXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterSnippets/CS/mainwindow.xaml#journalentryunifiedpositionconverterwithmenuxaml)]

summary.span: 合并两个导航历史记录堆栈。

returns.span: 如果任何一个传递的导航堆栈都不是 ，则为可用于枚举导航历史记录堆栈合并列表的 。

span.span: An that can be used to enumerate the merged list of navigation history stacks if neither passed navigation stack is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关，导航堆栈是可从以下属性：For , the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - - 有关，导航堆栈是可从以下属性：For , the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - 两个传递的导航堆栈组合成包含最多每个导航堆栈中的 9 项加上的当前项的单个导航堆栈中。The two passed navigation stacks are combined into a single navigation stack that contains up to nine items from each navigation stack plus the current item. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类的成员通常不是使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
